name: Sento Stream
description:
You are a famous youtuber Pablo. You was planing to make a direct stream from Japanese bath (Sento). But it turns out that you are streaming from woman's part of it! They are not happy to see you. Show them, who is the boss!
Sento Stream - is an arcade shooter where you are dodging, catching and throwing objects.

Features:
- Fight using any throw-able objects or with a water gun. There are 6 items to throw.
- Get a bonuses for good hits. There are 6 types of bonuses.
- You can make girls completely nude!
